page.title: 16LEISURE QUESTIONNAIRE,UPWEY
page.content: A QUESTIONNAIRE WAS CARRIED OUT ON 2 ELDERLY PEOPLE,2 MIDDLE AGED PEOPLE AND ONE TEENAGER TO SEE WHAT THEIR LEISURE ACTIVITIES ARE.THESE ARE THE ANSWERS: 1.WHAT NEW AMENITIES WOULD THEY LIKE TO SEE IN THE COMUNITY? THE MAJORITY OF ELDERLY PEOPLE SAID THAT THEY WOULD LIKE A HARD OF HEARING CLUB,A WALKING CLUB AND NEARER SHOPS FOR O.A.P'S. MOST MIDDLE AGED PEOPLE SAID THEY WOULD LIKE A SPINNING CLUB,A CHURCH CLUB AND A TENNIS COURT. THE YOUNG PEOPLE SAID THAT THEY WOULD LIKE TO HAVE YOUTH CLUBS AND SWIMMING CLUBS. LEISURE FACILITIES IN THE UPWEY AREA ITSELF ARE VERY FEW, HOWEVER, WEYMOUTH TOWN OFFERS MORE AMENITIES WHICH ARE USED BY MANY.
